menu.name: Carne Asada Street Taco
menu.description: Chopped up grilled steak on two corn tortillas, topped with onions, cilantro, and a lime wedge.

menu.name: Al Pastor Street Taco
menu.description: Chopped up grilled, marinated pork on two corn tortillas, topped with onions, cilantro, and a lime wedge.

menu.name: Pollo Street Taco
menu.description: Chopped up grilled chicken on two corn tortillas, topped with onions, cilantro, and a lime wedge.

menu.name: Nachos
menu.description: Crispy tortilla chips with melted cheese and tomatoes, and jalapenos. Add your choice of seasoned meat for a fully loaded option.

menu.name: Quesabirria
menu.description: Crispy, cheesy quesadillas filled with tender birria-style meat, served with a rich consomme for dipping. A Perfect blend of flavors and textures in every bite.

menu.name: Quesadilla
menu.description: Golden, Melted cheese folded in a warm corn tortilla. Add your choice of meat for just $1.00 to make it extra hearty.

menu.name: Tortas
menu.description: Fresh sandwich rolls loaded with ham, hot dogs, tomatoes, mayonnaise, lettuce, and your choice of meat. Served on high-quality bakery bread for a satisfying handheld meal.

menu.name: Flautas
menu.description: 4 Crispy, tightly rolled corn tortillas, stuffed with shredded chicken, fried to perfection, and served with sour cream, guacamole, tomatoes, and queso cotija for a crunchy, delicious bite.
